document.full_text: the afghan taliban have issued a statement acknowledging the death of osama bin laden after al qaeda confirmed its leader had been killed by u.s. forces, but said his death would only revitalize their fight against the "occupiers" in afghanistan.
document.title: taliban say bin laden death will revive afghan insurgency
lines_and_colors: the afghan taliban have issued a statement acknowledging the death of osama bin laden after al qaeda confirmed its leader had been killed by u.s. forces, but said his death would only revitalize their fight against the "occupiers" in afghanistan.
